original_text: I have food and drink for the men who are cutting the wool from my sheep. I have cooked meat for them to eat. But I will not give anything to you. You might have come from anywhere!’
korean_text: 내가 어찌 내 떡과 물과 내 양 털 깎는 자를 위하여 잡은 고기를 가져다가 어디서 왔는지도 알지 못하는 자들에게 주겠느냐 한지라

sentences.original_text: for the men who are cutting the wool
I have cooked meat for them
But I will not give anything to you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 당신에게 아무것도 주지 않겠소

sentences.original_text: You might have come from anywhere
